name: maintenance, tram | maintenance, tram | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/88/documentation

For energy data, yearly energy consumption figures from selected service garages of Swiss transport companies is employed. The data is presented for a life span of a tram of 30 years.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



The inventory includes materials  energy and resource consumption of garages. Rail and road transport of materials is accounted for
category: C:Manufacturing/33:Repair and installation of machinery and equipment/331:Repair of fabricated metal products, machinery and equipment/3315:Repair of transport equipment, except motor vehicles

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data, is based on a brief survey of public transport companies.
